document_data.caption: A map showing Al-Tarik Islands in the Golden Gulf.
document_data.name: Al-Tarik Islands
document_data.mainbody: '''Al-Tarik Islands''' were a large archipelago found in the [[Golden Gulf]] and [[Crowded Sea]] within [[west Zakhara]].
document_data.Geography:
Most of the islands of the archipelago were surrounded by coral reefs. The archipelago sat in between the mainland of the southwestern tip of the continent of [[Zakhara]] and [[Al-Qirmiza Islands]]. [[Jazayir al-Sartan]] was located directly south of Al-Tarik Islands. Most of the islands in the chain sat roughly {{SI|30|mi|k|long=yes}} off the coast from the [[Realm of Coffee]] in the west, stretching north through the Golden Gulf for about {{SI|300|mi|k|long=yes}} and nearing [[Ajayib]].

Fourteen individual islands were part of the archipelago. Several of the islands were named including:
* [[Tarikat Island]]
* [[Ma'mur Island]]
* [[Azim Island]]
